artifacts.tooltip.snorkel: Allows the wearer to breathe underwater
artifacts.tooltip.drinking_hat.drinking: Decreases the time it takes to drink items
artifacts.tooltip.drinking_hat.eating: Decreases the time it takes to eat items
artifacts.tooltip.drinking_hat.special: 'Hey! I'm #1, and I let gravity do my drinking!'
artifacts.tooltip.night_vision_goggles: Allows the wearer to see in the dark
artifacts.tooltip.panic_necklace: Increases the wearer's movement speed after taking damage
artifacts.tooltip.shock_pendant: Has a chance to strike attackers with lightning
artifacts.tooltip.flame_pendant: Has a chance to light attackers on fire
artifacts.tooltip.thorn_pendant: Has a chance to damage attackers
artifacts.tooltip.obsidian_skull: The wearer becomes temporarily immune to fire damage when hurt by fire
artifacts.tooltip.umbrella.shield: Can be used as a shield
artifacts.tooltip.fire_gauntlet: Causes the wearer's melee attacks to deal fire damage
artifacts.tooltip.pocket_piston: Increases knockback dealt by the wearer
artifacts.tooltip.power_glove: Increases damage dealt by the wearer
artifacts.tooltip.cross_necklace: Increases the length of invincibility after taking damage
artifacts.tooltip.antidote_vessel: Greatly reduces the duration of negative effects
artifacts.tooltip.lucky_scarf.single_lev: Applies an extra level of fortune to mined blocks
artifacts.tooltip.lucky_scarf.multiple_l: Applies %s extra levels of fortune to mined blocks
artifacts.tooltip.superstitious_hat.sing: Applies an extra level of looting to killed entities
artifacts.tooltip.superstitious_hat.mult: Applies %s extra levels of looting to killed entities
artifacts.tooltip.digging_claws.mining_l: Increases the wearer's base mining level to %s
artifacts.tooltip.running_shoes.movement: Increases the wearer's movement speed while sprinting
artifacts.tooltip.running_shoes.step_hei: Increases the wearer's step height while sprinting
artifacts.tooltip.villager_hat: Decreases the trading prices of villagers
artifacts.tooltip.cloud_in_a_bottle: Allows the wearer to double jump
artifacts.tooltip.vampiric_glove: Causes the wearer's melee attacks to absorb health
artifacts.tooltip.helium_flamingo.swimmi: Allows the wearer to swim in the air for a limited period of time.
artifacts.tooltip.helium_flamingo.keybin: Press %s while in the air to start swimming
artifacts.tooltip.aqua_dashers: Allows the wearer to walk on fluids while sprinting
artifacts.tooltip.charm_of_sinking: Allows the wearer to move freely in water
